timeline.message:
[aws-datastore] Refactor SubscriptionProcessor

The logic for the SubscriptionProcessor was split accross an anemic
class, the actual SubscriptionProcessor, and then another class called
RemoteModelMutations. Instead, thisl atter class is combined back into
the SubscriptionProcessor.

Unit test coverage is added.

Previously, the processor would not wait for all of the subscriptions to
have been fully established. This resulted in situations where data
could be missed on a subscription. To resolve this, wait receipt of a
subscription ID before yiedling control of a subscription observable.
